channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Mart√≠nez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Netflix strikes deal to buy Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: The deal, valued at around $80 billion, would create an entertainment and streaming behemoth. CNN and other cable channels owned by Warner Bros. are not part of the deal and would be spun off.
item.content:encoded: The deal, valued at around $80 billion, would create an entertainment and streaming behemoth. CNN and other cable channels owned by Warner Bros. are not part of the deal and would be spun off.
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: Defense secretary under fire as lawmakers question admiral about deadly boat strikes
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth is under pressure this week as a Navy admiral faces tough questions from lawmakers about the legality of striking boats allegedly carrying drugs in the Caribbean.
item.content:encoded: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth is under pressure this week as a Navy admiral faces tough questions from lawmakers about the legality of striking boats allegedly carrying drugs in the Caribbean.
item.dc:creator: Tom Bowman

item.title: Rep. Jim Himes recounts briefing on U.S. boat strike in the Caribbean
item.description: NPR's Michel Martins talks with Rep. Jim Himes, D-Conn., about what he learned in a briefing from the Navy admiral who ordered the second strike on a boat near Venezuela.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Michel Martins talks with Rep. Jim Himes, D-Conn., about what he learned in a briefing from the Navy admiral who ordered the second strike on a boat near Venezuela.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: FIFA to announce matchups for 2026 World Cup Friday
item.description: Soccer fans will learn Friday where their country will be playing in the FIFA World Cup 2026. The draw for the largest-ever tournament will take place in Washington, D.C.
item.content:encoded: Soccer fans will learn Friday where their country will be playing in the FIFA World Cup 2026. The draw for the largest-ever tournament will take place in Washington, D.C.
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: FBI arrests man who allegedly planted pipe bombs near DNC, RNC before Jan. 6 attack
item.description: The FBI announced Thursday the arrest of the man the believe planted two pipe bombs near the site of the U.S. Capitol complex on Jan. 6, 2021.
item.content:encoded: The FBI announced Thursday the arrest of the man the believe planted two pipe bombs near the site of the U.S. Capitol complex on Jan. 6, 2021.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Hegseth under fire amid new Signalgate report and boat strike briefing, the FBI arrests man they say planted pipe bombs near the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, SCOTUS allows Texas to use gerrymandered map.
item.content:encoded: Hegseth under fire amid new Signalgate report and boat strike briefing, the FBI arrests man they say planted pipe bombs near the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, SCOTUS allows Texas to use gerrymandered map.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Zac Brown shares his harrowing childhood story on 'Love & Fear'
item.description: The Zac Brown Band's first five albums hit #1 on the Billboard Country Charts. Their latest is "Love & Fear," and the band is celebrating with a set of shows at The Sphere in Las Vegas.
item.content:encoded: The Zac Brown Band's first five albums hit #1 on the Billboard Country Charts. Their latest is "Love & Fear," and the band is celebrating with a set of shows at The Sphere in Las Vegas.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Supreme Court says Texas can use GOP-friendly congressional map in 2026 midterms
item.description: The Supreme Court has given the Republican Party a boost in the redistricting fight for Congress by allowing a Texas map that may help the GOP win five more U.S. House seats in next year's midterms.
item.content:encoded: The Supreme Court has given the Republican Party a boost in the redistricting fight for Congress by allowing a Texas map that may help the GOP win five more U.S. House seats in next year's midterms.
item.dc:creator: Hansi Lo Wang

item.title: Colorado judge rules that immigration agents must stop warrantless arrests
item.description: A federal judge in Colorado says federal agents must stop arresting without warrants people they suspect of being in the U.S. illegally.
item.content:encoded: A federal judge in Colorado says federal agents must stop arresting without warrants people they suspect of being in the U.S. illegally.
item.dc:creator: Allison Sherry

item.title: Meta is building a massive data center. Why it's fueling fears of an AI bubble
item.description: In a rural pocket of northeastern Louisiana, Meta is building a $30 billion data center called Hyperion. The project highlights an opaque system of financing that's fueling fears of an AI bubble.
item.content:encoded: In a rural pocket of northeastern Louisiana, Meta is building a $30 billion data center called Hyperion. The project highlights an opaque system of financing that's fueling fears of an AI bubble.
item.dc:creator: Wailin Wong
